title: Student Loan Forgiveness Is a Hot Mess (Hour 1)
description:
Dave Ramsey & George Kamel discuss:

The ambiguity of the student loan forgiveness announcement,

If you should take a refund on student loans you've already paid back,

Dealing with bills in collections.


Support Our Sponsor:

Christian Healthcare Ministries

Churchill Mortgage
